column5: From the three of us, I had the only steelhead on the shore, mainly due to the superior shotting patterns I invented on the spot, and madd skilz with the float gear.      Does anyone still remember Percy?  This indeed was my first steelhead (a smolt or yearling?) and qualifies as my pb.  Lower case.  Someone also tagged a beauty whistle trout.  Those suckers always surprise me.  Thanks again to Cliff and Carole, always the best hosts, most generous and kind people.

The mud on that fish, you should be disgusted with yourself.  If every fish were handled in such a way neither you, nor your peers will have the opportunity to catch them in the future...  I hope you are proud.  Next go for goldfish at the Mandarin.
I sure was laughing when I typed it.  Looks like a great day.  Never met Cliff and Carole but have enjoyed my time with Doogle!!!

I thought you called douG a fish Pigeonfisher, since he's the one with all the mud on him....LOL.  Had another great day douG...too bad the conditions sucked!  Hopefully we'll have some more time out there...gotta get you a new PB....I suppose there is only one way to go from there....up.....  Suckers in the tribs is a bad sign...action tends to slow down once they get in there.  Thanks again for the awesome sandwiches too...we should have you come on all our outings...at least we'll be fed well.

lolololol Are you trying to start a RIOT....i whinced when i read that Pidgeon! lolololol  douG....Personal best is a personal best no matter the size! I have never caught a steelie  ...so your ahead of some of us lol. Looks like you had a great day, and that is a lovely sucker, i hope she got a kiss before she was sent her back lolol  -R-
There ya go douG, I see why ya left chat now... cant believe you outfished BLY?!?!?!?!?!
Congrats again on your pb trout douG!!   Always a good time and and good gweeches, thanks again!   Are you still laughing?
I certainly did NOT kiss that sucker...LOL.  I did eat doug's steelie though...was great between a few slices of bread.   Felt sick to my stomach after though....
ahh yes Percy, been a while nice job dooGGles
It is polite to offer the best drifts to a guest!    I learned that from a very good teacher

OMG!!!  douGlas with a dirty fish and Cliff caught a SUCKER!!!!  ... and to top it all off bly was on her best behavior and didn't outfish anyone???   Damn Timothy Leary and the 70's!!!!... where's the thorazine???

You look like you are holding up an offering to the God Loki in the first pic!  You must dish on what it takes to get Carole looking so fine for fishing.  Is it your axe cologne, rugged good looks, suave verbage or just a large Timmies as seen in the background?  Do tell.

Nice pb douG-gles....WTG Read with great interest your last outing w/hobbits et al. Glad you at least got into your first regardless of the size Bud.....they all come a mite easier now.  Sorry Se-noir Hobbit.. Stopped replying to all your trib posts as I would be repetitive but, PLEASE DO NOT STOP POSTING............. They are good reading each and everyone and I never tire reading you N Carole getting out..  Se-Noir Hobbit.... We will be having you as guests for sure this sumer to our Shire for some great eats/bevy's. Sorry for stepping on yer thread thar Dooogle... You are darned right-on..they are exellent folks to hang with as well great hosts. pete
Atta boy!
Got to love a woman who can rig up without chipping her nail polish .
Glad to see you're getting out and having fun bud, and congrat's on the pb  .
Very nice DouG.  I actually think Percy is bigger tho  Looks like a nice day was had by all.  Now I want a gweech!!  Joey
Looks like she did them "special" for that trip too eh Alex!

Dang you look awesome Carol...  And it was nice of you to let all those fish go so the boys could feel accomplished for the day...  Now thats a personal best DouG... one you can always improve on.  lol  Cheers,  Jen
Glad you got out Doug..  I think the tag team Carol / Cliff were taking it easy on ya
LOL, you told me it was small on Sunday but i didn't think that small....LOL hey you still did better than me that day!!! nice job and good meeting you !!
That PB will be tough to beat Doug.  Nice report.
